title: In a manner of speaking
creator_credit: Colin Dean and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Illustrates how the telephone can be used to conduct efficient business, and how good habits will improve relations with clients on the telephone. Advice is given on aids to switch-board staff to generally facilitate service to clients. Camera and lighting by Frank Bagnall and George Lowe.
creator_credit_for_label: Colin Dean and Australian National Film Board
